name: zap-cannon
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
